entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY ENDED, Schefferville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:08 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Schefferville Airport 6:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.3°C
Pressure: 99.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -8.3°C
Wind: SE 21 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
